03104 
03105 
03106 static void check_controller_state_mask(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *arg1_but, void *arg2_mask)
03107 {
03108     unsigned int *cont_mask = arg2_mask;
03109     uiBut *but = arg1_but;
03110     
03111     /* a controller is always in a single state */
03112     *cont_mask = (1<<but->retval);
03113     but->retval = B_REDR;
03114 }
03115 
03116 static int first_bit(unsigned int mask)
03117 {
03118     int bit;
03119 
03120     for (bit=0; bit<32; bit++) {
03121         if (mask & (1<<bit))
03122             return bit;
03123     }
03124     return -1;
03125 }
03126 
03127 static uiBlock *controller_state_mask_menu(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *arg_cont)
03128 {
03129     uiBlock *block;
03130     uiBut *but;
03131     bController *cont = arg_cont;
03132 
03133     short yco = 12, xco = 0, stbit, offset;
03134 
03135     block= uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSS);
03136 
03137     /* use this for a fake extra empy space around the buttons */
03138     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, "",           -5, -5, 200, 34, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
03139     
03140     for (offset=0; offset<15; offset+=5) {
03141         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
03142         for (stbit=0; stbit<5; stbit++) {
03143             but = uiDefButBitI(block, TOG, (1<<(stbit+offset)), (stbit+offset), "", (short)(xco+12*stbit+13*offset), yco, 12, 12, (int *)&(cont->state_mask), 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
03144             uiButSetFunc(but, check_controller_state_mask, but, &(cont->state_mask));
03145         }
03146         for (stbit=0; stbit<5; stbit++) {
03147             but = uiDefButBitI(block, TOG, (1<<(stbit+offset+15)), (stbit+offset+15), "",   (short)(xco+12*stbit+13*offset), yco-12, 12, 12, (int *)&(cont->state_mask), 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
03148             uiButSetFunc(but, check_controller_state_mask, but, &(cont->state_mask));
03149         }
03150     }
03151     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
03152 
03153     uiBlockSetDirection(block, UI_TOP);
03154     uiEndBlock(C, block);
03155 
03156     return block;
03157 }
03158 
03159 static void do_object_state_menu(bContext *UNUSED(C), void *arg, int event)
03160 {   
03161     Object *ob = arg;
03162 
03163     switch (event) {
03164     case 0:
03165         ob->state = 0x3FFFFFFF;
03166         break;
03167     case 1:
03168         ob->state = ob->init_state;
03169         if (!ob->state)
03170             ob->state = 1;
03171         break;
03172     case 2:
03173         ob->init_state = ob->state;
03174         break;
03175     }
03176 }
03177 
03178 static uiBlock *object_state_mask_menu(bContext *C, ARegion *ar, void *arg_obj)
03179 {
03180     uiBlock *block;
03181     short xco = 0;
03182 
03183     block= uiBeginBlock(C, ar, __func__, UI_EMBOSSP);
03184     uiBlockSetButmFunc(block, do_object_state_menu, arg_obj);
03185     
03186     uiDefBut(block, BUTM, 1, "Set all bits",        0, (short)(xco-=20), 160, 19, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 1, 0, "");
03187     uiDefBut(block, BUTM, 1, "Recall init state",   0, (short)(xco-=20), 160, 19, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 1, 1, "");
03188     uiDefBut(block, SEPR, 0, "",                    0, (short)(xco-=6),  160, 6,  NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
03189     uiDefBut(block, BUTM, 1, "Store init state",    0, (short)(xco-=20), 160, 19, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 1, 2, "");
03190 
03191     uiBlockSetDirection(block, UI_TOP);
03192     uiEndBlock(C, block);
03193     
03194     return block;
03195 }
03196 
03197 static int is_sensor_linked(uiBlock *block, bSensor *sens)
03198 {
03199     bController *cont;
03200     int i;
03201 
03202     for (i=0; i<sens->totlinks; i++) {
03203         cont = sens->links[i];
03204         if (uiFindInlink(block, cont) != NULL)
03205             return 1;
03206     }
03207     return 0;
03208 }
03209 
03210 /* Sensors code */
03211 
03212 static void draw_sensor_header(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA *logic_ptr)
03213 {
03214     uiLayout *box, *row, *sub;
03215     bSensor *sens= (bSensor *)ptr->data;
03216     
03217     box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
03218     row= uiLayoutRow(box, 0);
03219     
03220     uiItemR(row, ptr, "show_expanded", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_NONE);
03221     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")) {
03222         uiItemR(row, ptr, "type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03223         uiItemR(row, ptr, "name", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03224     }
03225     else {
03226         uiItemL(row, sensor_name(sens->type), ICON_NONE);
03227         uiItemL(row, sens->name, ICON_NONE);
03228     }
03229 
03230     sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 0);
03231     uiLayoutSetActive(sub, ((RNA_boolean_get(logic_ptr, "show_sensors_active_states") &&
03232                              RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")) || RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "pin")));
03233     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "pin", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_NONE);
03234 
03235     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")==0) {
03236         sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
03237         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_sensor_move", "", ICON_TRIA_UP, "direction", 1); // up
03238         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_sensor_move", "", ICON_TRIA_DOWN, "direction", 2); // down
03239     }
03240 
03241     uiItemO(row, "", ICON_X, "LOGIC_OT_sensor_remove");
03242 }
03243 
03244 static void draw_sensor_internal_header(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03245 {
03246     uiLayout *box, *split, *sub, *row;
03247 
03248     box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
03249     split = uiLayoutSplit(box, 0.45, 0);
03250     
03251     row= uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
03252     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_pulse_true_level", 0, "", ICON_DOTSUP);
03253     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_pulse_false_level", 0, "", ICON_DOTSDOWN);
03254 
03255     sub=uiLayoutRow(row, 0);
03256     uiLayoutSetActive(sub, (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_pulse_true_level") ||
03257                             RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_pulse_false_level")));
03258     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "frequency", 0, "Freq", ICON_NONE);
03259     
03260     row= uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
03261     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_level", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03262     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_tap", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03263     
03264     uiItemR(split, ptr, "invert", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, "Invert", ICON_NONE);
03265 }
03266 /* sensors in alphabetical order */

03268 static void draw_sensor_actuator(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03269 {
03270     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
03271     PointerRNA settings_ptr;
03272 
03273     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
03274     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "actuator", &settings_ptr, "actuators", NULL, ICON_LOGIC);
03275 }
03276 
03277 static void draw_sensor_armature(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03278 {
03279     bSensor *sens = (bSensor*)ptr->data;
03280     bArmatureSensor *as = (bArmatureSensor *) sens->data;
03281     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
03282     PointerRNA pose_ptr, pchan_ptr;
03283     PropertyRNA *bones_prop= NULL;
03284     uiLayout *row;
03285 
03286     if (ob->type != OB_ARMATURE) {
03287         uiItemL(layout, "Sensor only available for armatures", ICON_NONE);
03288         return;
03289     }
03290 
03291     if (ob->pose) {
03292         RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_Pose, ob->pose, &pose_ptr);
03293         bones_prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&pose_ptr, "bones");
03294     }
03295 
03296     if (&pose_ptr.data) {
03297         uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "bone", &pose_ptr, "bones", NULL, ICON_BONE_DATA);
03298 
03299         if (RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&pose_ptr, bones_prop, as->posechannel, &pchan_ptr))
03300             uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "constraint", &pchan_ptr, "constraints", NULL, ICON_CONSTRAINT_BONE);
03301     }
03302     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
03303     uiItemR(row, ptr, "test_type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03304     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "test_type") != SENS_ARM_STATE_CHANGED)
03305         uiItemR(row, ptr, "value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03306 }
03307 
03308 static void draw_sensor_collision(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, bContext *C)
03309 {
03310     uiLayout *row, *split;
03311     PointerRNA main_ptr;
03312 
03313     RNA_main_pointer_create(CTX_data_main(C), &main_ptr);
03314 
03315     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.3, 0);
03316     row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
03317     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_pulse", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03318     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_material", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03319 
03320     switch (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_material")) {
03321         case SENS_COLLISION_PROPERTY:
03322             uiItemR(split, ptr, "property", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03323             break;
03324         case SENS_COLLISION_MATERIAL:
03325             uiItemPointerR(split, ptr, "material", &main_ptr, "materials", NULL, ICON_MATERIAL_DATA);
03326             break;
03327     }
03328 }

03341 static void draw_sensor_joystick(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03342 {

03344 
03345     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "joystick_index", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03346     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "event_type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03347 
03348     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "event_type")) {
03349         case SENS_JOY_BUTTON:
03350             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "use_all_events", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03351 
03352             col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
03353             uiLayoutSetActive(col, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_all_events")==0);
03354             uiItemR(col, ptr, "button_number", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03355             break;
03356         case SENS_JOY_AXIS:
03357             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03358             uiItemR(row, ptr, "axis_number", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03359             uiItemR(row, ptr, "axis_threshold", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03360 
03361             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "use_all_events", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03362             col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
03363             uiLayoutSetActive(col, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_all_events")==0);
03364             uiItemR(col, ptr, "axis_direction", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03365             break;
03366         case SENS_JOY_HAT:
03367             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "hat_number", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03368             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "use_all_events", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03369 
03370             col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
03371             uiLayoutSetActive(col, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_all_events")==0);
03372             uiItemR(col, ptr, "hat_direction", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03373             break;
03374         case SENS_JOY_AXIS_SINGLE:
03375             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03376             uiItemR(row, ptr, "single_axis_number", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03377             uiItemR(row, ptr, "axis_threshold", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03378             break;
03379     }
03380 }

03407     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "log", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
03408     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "target", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);

03441     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);

03444         case SENS_PROP_INTERVAL:

03447             uiItemR(row, ptr, "value_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03448             break;

03450             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03451             break;
03452         case SENS_PROP_NEQUAL:
03453             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03454             break;
03455         case SENS_PROP_CHANGED:
03456             break;
03457     }

03505 
03506 static void draw_brick_sensor(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, bContext *C)
03507 {
03508     uiLayout *box;
03509     
03510     if (!RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded"))
03511         return;
03512 
03513     draw_sensor_internal_header(layout, ptr);
03514     
03515     box = uiLayoutBox(layout);
03516 
03517     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "type")) {
03518 
03519         case SENS_ACTUATOR:
03520             draw_sensor_actuator(box, ptr);
03521             break;
03522         case SENS_ALWAYS:
03523             break;
03524         case SENS_ARMATURE:
03525             draw_sensor_armature(box, ptr);
03526             break;
03527         case SENS_COLLISION:
03528             draw_sensor_collision(box, ptr, C);
03529             break;
03530         case SENS_DELAY:
03531             draw_sensor_delay(box, ptr);
03532             break;
03533         case SENS_JOYSTICK:
03534             draw_sensor_joystick(box, ptr);
03535             break;
03536         case SENS_KEYBOARD:
03537             draw_sensor_keyboard(box, ptr);
03538             break;
03539         case SENS_MESSAGE:
03540             draw_sensor_message(box, ptr);
03541             break;
03542         case SENS_MOUSE:
03543             draw_sensor_mouse(box, ptr);
03544             break;
03545         case SENS_NEAR:
03546             draw_sensor_near(box, ptr);
03547             break;
03548         case SENS_PROPERTY:
03549             draw_sensor_property(box, ptr);
03550             break;
03551         case SENS_RADAR:
03552             draw_sensor_radar(box, ptr);
03553             break;
03554         case SENS_RANDOM:
03555             draw_sensor_random(box, ptr);
03556             break;
03557         case SENS_RAY:
03558             draw_sensor_ray(box, ptr, C);
03559             break;
03560         case SENS_TOUCH:
03561             draw_sensor_touch(box, ptr);
03562             break;
03563     }
03564 }
03565 
03566 /* Controller code */
03567 static void draw_controller_header(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, int xco, int width, int yco)
03568 {
03569     uiLayout *box, *row, *sub;
03570     bController *cont= (bController *)ptr->data;
03571 
03572     char state[3];
03573     BLI_snprintf(state, sizeof(state), "%d", RNA_int_get(ptr, "states"));
03574     
03575     box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
03576     row= uiLayoutRow(box, 0);
03577     
03578     uiItemR(row, ptr, "show_expanded", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_NONE);
03579     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")) {
03580         uiItemR(row, ptr, "type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03581         uiItemR(row, ptr, "name", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03582         /* XXX provisory for Blender 2.50Beta */
03583         uiDefBlockBut(uiLayoutGetBlock(layout), controller_state_mask_menu, cont, state, (short)(xco+width-44), yco, 22+22, UI_UNIT_Y, "Set controller state index (from 1 to 30)");
03584     }
03585     else {
03586         uiItemL(row, controller_name(cont->type), ICON_NONE);
03587         uiItemL(row, cont->name, ICON_NONE);
03588         uiItemL(row, state, ICON_NONE);
03589     }
03590 
03591     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_priority", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03592 
03593     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")==0) {
03594         sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
03595         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_controller_move", "", ICON_TRIA_UP, "direction", 1); // up
03596         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_controller_move", "", ICON_TRIA_DOWN, "direction", 2); // down
03597     }
03598     uiItemO(row, "", ICON_X, "LOGIC_OT_controller_remove");
03599 }

03606 static void draw_controller_python(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03607 {
03608     uiLayout *split, *sub;
03609 
03610     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.3, 1);

03612     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode") == CONT_PY_SCRIPT) {
03613         uiItemR(split, ptr, "text", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03614     }
03615     else {
03616         sub = uiLayoutSplit(split, 0.8, 0);
03617         uiItemR(sub, ptr, "module", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03618         uiItemR(sub, ptr, "use_debug", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03619     }
03620 }

03623 {
03624

03626 
03627 static void draw_brick_controller(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03628 {
03629     uiLayout *box;
03630     
03631     if (!RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded"))
03632         return;
03633     
03634     box = uiLayoutBox(layout);
03635 
03636     draw_controller_state(box, ptr);
03637     
03638     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "type")) {
03639         case CONT_LOGIC_AND:
03640             break;
03641         case CONT_LOGIC_OR:
03642             break;
03643         case CONT_EXPRESSION:
03644             draw_controller_expression(box, ptr);
03645             break;
03646         case CONT_PYTHON:
03647             draw_controller_python(box, ptr);
03648             break;
03649         case CONT_LOGIC_NAND:
03650             break;
03651         case CONT_LOGIC_NOR:
03652             break;
03653         case CONT_LOGIC_XOR:
03654             break;
03655         case CONT_LOGIC_XNOR:
03656             break;
03657     }
03658 }

03660 /* Actuator code */
03661 static void draw_actuator_header(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA *logic_ptr)
03662 {
03663     uiLayout *box, *row, *sub;
03664     bActuator *act= (bActuator *)ptr->data;
03665     
03666     box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
03667     row= uiLayoutRow(box, 0);
03668     
03669     uiItemR(row, ptr, "show_expanded", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_NONE);
03670     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")) {
03671         uiItemR(row, ptr, "type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03672         uiItemR(row, ptr, "name", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03673     }
03674     else {
03675         uiItemL(row, actuator_name(act->type), ICON_NONE);
03676         uiItemL(row, act->name, ICON_NONE);
03677     }
03678 
03679     sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 0);
03680     uiLayoutSetActive(sub, ((RNA_boolean_get(logic_ptr, "show_actuators_active_states") &&
03681                              RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")) || RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "pin")));
03682     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "pin", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_NONE);
03683 
03684     if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded")==0) {
03685         sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
03686         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_actuator_move", "", ICON_TRIA_UP, "direction", 1); // up
03687         uiItemEnumO(sub, "LOGIC_OT_actuator_move", "", ICON_TRIA_DOWN, "direction", 2); // down
03688     }
03689     uiItemO(row, "", ICON_X, "LOGIC_OT_actuator_remove");
03690 }
03691 
03692 static void draw_actuator_action(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03693 {
03694     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
03695     PointerRNA settings_ptr;
03696     uiLayout *row, *sub;
03697 
03698     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
03699 
03700     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03701     uiItemR(row, ptr, "play_mode", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03702 
03703     sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
03704     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "use_force", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03705     uiItemR(sub, ptr, "use_additive", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03706 
03707     row = uiLayoutColumn(sub, 0);
03708     uiLayoutSetActive(row, (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_additive") || RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_force")));
03709     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_local", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03710 
03711     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03712     uiItemR(row, ptr, "action", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03713     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_continue_last_frame", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03714 
03715     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03716     if ((RNA_enum_get(ptr, "play_mode") == ACT_ACTION_FROM_PROP))
03717         uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
03718 
03719     else {
03720         uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_start", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03721         uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_end", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03722     }
03723 
03724     uiItemR(row, ptr, "apply_to_children", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03725 
03726     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03727     uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_blend_in", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03728     uiItemR(row, ptr, "priority", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03729 
03730     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03731     uiItemR(row, ptr, "layer", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03732     uiItemR(row, ptr, "layer_weight", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03733 
03734     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "frame_property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
03735 
03736 #ifdef __NLA_ACTION_BY_MOTION_ACTUATOR
03737     uiItemR(layout, "stride_length", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03738 #endif
03739 }
03740 
03741 static void draw_actuator_armature(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03742 {
03743     bActuator *act = (bActuator*)ptr->data;
03744     bArmatureActuator *aa = (bArmatureActuator *) act->data;
03745     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
03746     bConstraint *constraint = NULL;
03747     PointerRNA pose_ptr, pchan_ptr;
03748     PropertyRNA *bones_prop = NULL;
03749 
03750     if (ob->type != OB_ARMATURE) {
03751         uiItemL(layout, "Actuator only available for armatures", ICON_NONE);
03752         return;
03753     }
03754     
03755     if (ob->pose) {
03756         RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_Pose, ob->pose, &pose_ptr);
03757         bones_prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&pose_ptr, "bones");
03758     }
03759     
03760     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03761     
03762     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode"))
03763     {
03764         case ACT_ARM_RUN:
03765             break;
03766         case ACT_ARM_ENABLE:
03767         case ACT_ARM_DISABLE:
03768             if (ob->pose) {
03769                 uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "bone", &pose_ptr, "bones", NULL, ICON_BONE_DATA);
03770 
03771                 if (RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&pose_ptr, bones_prop, aa->posechannel, &pchan_ptr))
03772                     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "constraint", &pchan_ptr, "constraints", NULL, ICON_CONSTRAINT_BONE);
03773             }
03774             break;
03775         case ACT_ARM_SETTARGET:
03776             if (ob->pose) {
03777                 uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "bone", &pose_ptr, "bones", NULL, ICON_BONE_DATA);
03778                 
03779                 if (RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&pose_ptr, bones_prop, aa->posechannel, &pchan_ptr))
03780                     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "constraint", &pchan_ptr, "constraints", NULL, ICON_CONSTRAINT_BONE);
03781             }
03782 
03783             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "target", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03784 
03785             /* show second target only if the constraint supports it */
03786             get_armature_bone_constraint(ob, aa->posechannel, aa->constraint, &constraint);
03787             if (constraint && constraint->type == CONSTRAINT_TYPE_KINEMATIC) {
03788                 uiItemR(layout, ptr, "secondary_target", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03789             }
03790             break;
03791         case ACT_ARM_SETWEIGHT:
03792             if (ob->pose) {
03793                 uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "bone", &pose_ptr, "bones", NULL, ICON_BONE_DATA);
03794                 
03795                 if (RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&pose_ptr, bones_prop, aa->posechannel, &pchan_ptr))
03796                     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "constraint", &pchan_ptr, "constraints", NULL, ICON_CONSTRAINT_BONE);
03797             }
03798 
03799             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "weight", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03800             break;
03801         case ACT_ARM_SETINFLUENCE:
03802             if (ob->pose) {
03803                 uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "bone", &pose_ptr, "bones", NULL, ICON_BONE_DATA);
03804                 
03805                 if (RNA_property_collection_lookup_string(&pose_ptr, bones_prop, aa->posechannel, &pchan_ptr))
03806                     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "constraint", &pchan_ptr, "constraints", NULL, ICON_CONSTRAINT_BONE);
03807             }
03808 
03809             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03810             break;
03811     }
03812 }
03813 
03814 static void draw_actuator_camera(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03815 {
03816     uiLayout *row;
03817     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "object", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03818 
03819     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03820     uiItemR(row, ptr, "height", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03821     uiItemR(row, ptr, "axis", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03822 
03823     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
03824     uiItemR(row, ptr, "min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03825     uiItemR(row, ptr, "max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03826 
03827     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "damping", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03828 }

03830 static void draw_actuator_constraint(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, bContext *C)
03831 {
03832     uiLayout *row, *col, *sub, *split;
03833     PointerRNA main_ptr;
03834 
03835     RNA_main_pointer_create(CTX_data_main(C), &main_ptr);
03836 
03837     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03838     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode"))
03839     {
03840         case ACT_CONST_TYPE_LOC:
03841             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "limit", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03842 
03843             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
03844             uiItemR(row, ptr, "limit_min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03845             uiItemR(row, ptr, "limit_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03846 
03847             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "damping", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03848             break;
03849 
03850         case ACT_CONST_TYPE_DIST:
03851             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.8, 0);
03852             uiItemR(split, ptr, "direction", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03853             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
03854             uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_local", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03855             uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_normal", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03856 
03857             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03858             col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 1);
03859             uiItemL(col, "Range:", ICON_NONE);
03860             uiItemR(col, ptr, "range", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03861 
03862             col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 1);
03863             uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_force_distance", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03864             sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 0);
03865             uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_force_distance")==1);
03866             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "distance", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
03867 
03868             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "damping", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER , NULL, ICON_NONE);
03869 
03870             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.15, 0);
03871             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_material_detect", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03872             if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_material_detect"))
03873                 uiItemPointerR(split, ptr, "material", &main_ptr, "materials", NULL, ICON_MATERIAL_DATA);
03874             else
03875                 uiItemR(split, ptr, "property", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03876 
03877             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.15, 0);
03878             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_persistent", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03879 
03880             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
03881             uiItemR(row, ptr, "time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03882             uiItemR(row, ptr, "damping_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03883             break;
03884 
03885         case ACT_CONST_TYPE_ORI:
03886             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "direction_axis_pos", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03887 
03888             row=uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
03889             uiItemR(row, ptr, "damping", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER , NULL, ICON_NONE);
03890             uiItemR(row, ptr, "time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03891 
03892             row=uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03893             uiItemR(row, ptr, "rotation_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03894 
03895             row=uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
03896             uiItemR(row, ptr, "angle_min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03897             uiItemR(row, ptr, "angle_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03898             break;
03899 
03900         case ACT_CONST_TYPE_FH:
03901             split=uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.75, 0);
03902             row= uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
03903             uiItemR(row, ptr, "fh_damping", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER , NULL, ICON_NONE);
03904 
03905             uiItemR(row, ptr, "fh_height", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03906             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_fh_paralel_axis", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE , NULL, ICON_NONE);
03907 
03908             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03909             uiItemR(row, ptr, "direction_axis", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03910             split = uiLayoutSplit(row, 0.9, 0);
03911             uiItemR(split, ptr, "fh_force", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03912             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_fh_normal", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE , NULL, ICON_NONE);
03913 
03914             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.15, 0);
03915             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_material_detect", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03916             if (RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_material_detect"))
03917                 uiItemPointerR(split, ptr, "material", &main_ptr, "materials", NULL, ICON_MATERIAL_DATA);
03918             else
03919                 uiItemR(split, ptr, "property", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03920 
03921             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.15, 0);
03922             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_persistent", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03923 
03924             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
03925             uiItemR(row, ptr, "time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03926             uiItemR(row, ptr, "damping_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03927             break;
03928     }
03929 }
03930 
03931 static void draw_actuator_edit_object(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03932 {
03933     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
03934     uiLayout *row, *split, *sub;
03935     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03936 
03937     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode"))
03938     {
03939         case ACT_EDOB_ADD_OBJECT:
03940             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
03941             uiItemR(row, ptr, "object", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03942             uiItemR(row, ptr, "time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03943 
03944             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
03945             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
03946             uiItemR(row, ptr, "linear_velocity", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03947             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_linear_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03948 
03949             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
03950             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
03951             uiItemR(row, ptr, "angular_velocity", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03952             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_angular_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03953             break;
03954         case ACT_EDOB_END_OBJECT:
03955             break;
03956         case ACT_EDOB_REPLACE_MESH:
03957             if (ob->type != OB_MESH) {
03958                 uiItemL(layout, "Mode only available for mesh objects", ICON_NONE);
03959                 break;
03960             }
03961             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.6, 0);
03962             uiItemR(split, ptr, "mesh", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03963             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
03964             uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_replace_display_mesh", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03965             uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_replace_physics_mesh", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03966             break;
03967         case ACT_EDOB_TRACK_TO:
03968             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.5, 0);
03969             uiItemR(split, ptr, "track_object", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03970             sub = uiLayoutSplit(split, 0.7, 0);
03971             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03972             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "use_3d_tracking", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03973             break;
03974         case ACT_EDOB_DYNAMICS:
03975             if (ob->type != OB_MESH) {
03976                 uiItemL(layout, "Mode only available for mesh objects", ICON_NONE);
03977                 break;
03978             }
03979             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "dynamic_operation", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03980             if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "dynamic_operation") == ACT_EDOB_SET_MASS)
03981                 uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mass", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03982             break;
03983     }
03984 }

03986 static void draw_actuator_filter_2d(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
03987 {
03988     uiLayout *row, *split;
03989 
03990     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03991     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode"))
03992     {
03993         case ACT_2DFILTER_CUSTOMFILTER:
03994             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "filter_pass", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03995             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "glsl_shader", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
03996             break;
03997         case ACT_2DFILTER_MOTIONBLUR:
03998             split=uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.75, 1);
03999             row= uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04000             uiLayoutSetActive(row, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_motion_blur")==1);
04001             uiItemR(row, ptr, "motion_blur_factor", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04002             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_motion_blur", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04003             break;
04004         default: // all other 2D Filters
04005             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "filter_pass", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04006             break;
04007     }
04008 }

04027 
04028     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "to_property", &main_ptr, "objects", NULL, ICON_OBJECT_DATA);
04029     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "subject", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04030 
04031     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04032     uiItemR(row, ptr, "body_type", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04033 
04034     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "body_type") == ACT_MESG_MESG)
04035         uiItemR(row, ptr, "body_message", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
04036     else // mode == ACT_MESG_PROP
04037         uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "body_property", &settings_ptr, "properties", "", ICON_NONE);

04040 static void draw_actuator_motion(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04041 {
04042     Object *ob;
04043     PointerRNA settings_ptr;
04044     uiLayout *split, *row, *col, *sub;
04045     int physics_type;
04046 
04047     ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;    
04048     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
04049     physics_type = RNA_enum_get(&settings_ptr, "physics_type");
04050     
04051     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04052     
04053     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode")) {
04054         case ACT_OBJECT_NORMAL:
04055             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04056             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04057             uiItemR(row, ptr, "offset_location", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04058             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_location", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04059 
04060             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04061             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04062             uiItemR(row, ptr, "offset_rotation", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04063             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_rotation", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04064             
04065             if (ELEM3(physics_type, OB_BODY_TYPE_DYNAMIC, OB_BODY_TYPE_RIGID, OB_BODY_TYPE_SOFT)) {         
04066                 uiItemL(layout, "Dynamic Object Settings:", ICON_NONE);
04067                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04068                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04069                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "force", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04070                 uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_force", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04071 
04072                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04073                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04074                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "torque", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04075                 uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_torque", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04076 
04077                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04078                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04079                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "linear_velocity", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04080                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
04081                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_local_linear_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04082                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_add_linear_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04083 
04084                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04085                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04086                 uiItemR(row, ptr, "angular_velocity", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04087                 uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_angular_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04088 
04089                 uiItemR(layout, ptr, "damping", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04090             }
04091             break;
04092         case ACT_OBJECT_SERVO:
04093             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "reference_object", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04094 
04095             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.9, 0);
04096             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
04097             uiItemR(row, ptr, "linear_velocity", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04098             uiItemR(split, ptr, "use_local_linear_velocity", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04099 
04100             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04101             col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04102             uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_servo_limit_x", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04103             sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 1);
04104             uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_servo_limit_x")==1);
04105             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_max_x", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04106             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_min_x", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04107 
04108             col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04109             uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_servo_limit_y", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04110             sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 1);
04111             uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_servo_limit_y")==1);
04112             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_max_y", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04113             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_min_y", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04114 
04115             col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04116             uiItemR(col, ptr, "use_servo_limit_z", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04117             sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 1);
04118             uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "use_servo_limit_z")==1);
04119             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_max_z", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04120             uiItemR(sub, ptr, "force_min_z", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04121 
04122             //XXXACTUATOR missing labels from original 2.49 ui (e.g. Servo, Min, Max, Fast)
04123             //Layout designers willing to help on that, please compare with 2.49 ui
04124             // (since the old code is going to be deleted ... soon)
04125 
04126             col = uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
04127             uiItemR(col, ptr, "proportional_coefficient", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04128             uiItemR(col, ptr, "integral_coefficient", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04129             uiItemR(col, ptr, "derivate_coefficient", UI_ITEM_R_SLIDER, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04130             break;
04131     }
04132 }

04134 static void draw_actuator_parent(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04135 {

04150 
04151 static void draw_actuator_property(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04152 {
04153     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
04154     bActuator *act = (bActuator *)ptr->data;
04155     bPropertyActuator *pa = (bPropertyActuator *) act->data;
04156     Object *ob_from= pa->ob;
04157     PointerRNA settings_ptr, obj_settings_ptr;
04158 
04159     uiLayout *row, *sub;
04160 
04161     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
04162 
04163     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04164     uiItemPointerR(layout, ptr, "property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
04165 
04166     switch(RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode"))
04167     {
04168         case ACT_PROP_TOGGLE:
04169             break;
04170         case ACT_PROP_ADD:
04171             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04172             break;
04173         case ACT_PROP_ASSIGN:
04174             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04175             break;
04176         case ACT_PROP_COPY:
04177             row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04178             uiItemR(row, ptr, "object", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04179             if (ob_from) {
04180                 RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob_from, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob_from, &obj_settings_ptr);
04181                 uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "object_property", &obj_settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
04182             }
04183             else {
04184                 sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 0);
04185                 uiLayoutSetActive(sub, 0);
04186                 uiItemR(sub, ptr, "object_property", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04187             }
04188             break;
04189     }
04190 }
04191 
04192 static void draw_actuator_random(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04193 {
04194     Object *ob;
04195     PointerRNA settings_ptr;
04196     uiLayout *row;
04197 
04198     ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
04199     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
04200 
04201     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04202 
04203     uiItemR(row, ptr, "seed", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04204     uiItemR(row, ptr, "distribution", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04205 
04206     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04207     uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
04208 
04209     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04210 
04211     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "distribution")) {
04212         case ACT_RANDOM_BOOL_CONST:
04213             uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_always_true", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04214             break;
04215 
04216         case ACT_RANDOM_BOOL_UNIFORM:
04217             uiItemL(row, "Choose between true and false, 50% chance each", ICON_NONE);
04218             break;
04219 
04220         case ACT_RANDOM_BOOL_BERNOUILLI:
04221             uiItemR(row, ptr, "chance", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04222             break;
04223 
04224         case ACT_RANDOM_INT_CONST:
04225             uiItemR(row, ptr, "int_value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04226             break;
04227 
04228         case ACT_RANDOM_INT_UNIFORM:
04229             uiItemR(row, ptr, "int_min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04230             uiItemR(row, ptr, "int_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04231             break;
04232 
04233         case ACT_RANDOM_INT_POISSON:
04234             uiItemR(row, ptr, "int_mean", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04235             break;
04236 
04237         case ACT_RANDOM_FLOAT_CONST:
04238             uiItemR(row, ptr, "float_value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04239             break;
04240 
04241         case ACT_RANDOM_FLOAT_UNIFORM:
04242             uiItemR(row, ptr, "float_min", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04243             uiItemR(row, ptr, "float_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04244             break;
04245 
04246         case ACT_RANDOM_FLOAT_NORMAL:
04247             uiItemR(row, ptr, "float_mean", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04248             uiItemR(row, ptr, "standard_derivation", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04249             break;
04250 
04251         case ACT_RANDOM_FLOAT_NEGATIVE_EXPONENTIAL:
04252             uiItemR(row, ptr, "half_life_time", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04253             break;
04254     }
04255 }
04256 
04257 static void draw_actuator_scene(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04258 {
04259     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04260 
04261     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode")) {
04262         case ACT_SCENE_CAMERA:
04263             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "camera", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04264             break;
04265         case ACT_SCENE_RESTART:
04266             break;
04267         default: // ACT_SCENE_SET|ACT_SCENE_ADD_FRONT|ACT_SCENE_ADD_BACK|ACT_SCENE_REMOVE|ACT_SCENE_SUSPEND|ACT_SCENE_RESUME
04268             uiItemR(layout, ptr, "scene", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04269             break;
04270     }
04271 }
04272 
04273 static void draw_actuator_shape_action(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04274 {
04275     Object *ob = (Object *)ptr->id.data;
04276     PointerRNA settings_ptr;
04277     uiLayout *row;
04278 
04279     if (ob->type != OB_MESH) {
04280         uiItemL(layout, "Actuator only available for mesh objects", ICON_NONE);
04281         return;
04282     }
04283 
04284     RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
04285 
04286     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04287     uiItemR(row, ptr, "mode", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
04288     uiItemR(row, ptr, "action", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
04289     uiItemR(row, ptr, "use_continue_last_frame", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04290 
04291     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04292     if ((RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode") == ACT_ACTION_FROM_PROP))
04293         uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
04294 
04295     else {
04296         uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_start", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04297         uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_end", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04298     }
04299 
04300     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04301     uiItemR(row, ptr, "frame_blend_in", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04302     uiItemR(row, ptr, "priority", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04303 
04304     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04305     uiItemPointerR(row, ptr, "frame_property", &settings_ptr, "properties", NULL, ICON_NONE);
04306 
04307 #ifdef __NLA_ACTION_BY_MOTION_ACTUATOR
04308     uiItemR(row, "stride_length", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04309 #endif
04310 }

04338     uiItemR(row, ptr, "distance_3d_max", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04339

04341     uiItemR(row, ptr, "rolloff_factor_3d", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);

04343

04346     uiItemR(row, ptr, "cone_inner_angle_3d", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
