04372 static void draw_actuator_steering(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr)
04373 {
04374     uiLayout *row;
04375     uiLayout *col;
04376 
04377     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "mode", 0, NULL, 0);
04378     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "target", 0, NULL, 0);
04379     uiItemR(layout, ptr, "navmesh", 0, NULL, 0);    
04380 
04381     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04382     uiItemR(row, ptr, "distance", 0, NULL, 0);
04383     uiItemR(row, ptr, "velocity", 0, NULL, 0);
04384     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04385     uiItemR(row, ptr, "acceleration", 0, NULL, 0);
04386     uiItemR(row, ptr, "turn_speed", 0, NULL, 0);
04387 
04388     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04389     col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04390     uiItemR(col, ptr, "facing", 0, NULL, 0);
04391     col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04392     uiItemR(col, ptr, "facing_axis", 0, NULL, 0);
04393     if (!RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "facing")) {
04394         uiLayoutSetActive(col, 0);
04395     }
04396     col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
04397     uiItemR(col, ptr, "normal_up", 0, NULL, 0);
04398     if (!RNA_pointer_get(ptr, "navmesh").data) {
04399         uiLayoutSetActive(col, 0);
04400     }
04401 
04402     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04403     uiItemR(row, ptr, "self_terminated", 0, NULL, 0);
04404     if (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "mode")==ACT_STEERING_PATHFOLLOWING) {
04405         uiItemR(row, ptr, "update_period", 0, NULL, 0); 
04406         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
04407     }
04408     uiItemR(row, ptr, "show_visualization", 0, NULL, 0);    
04409 }
04410 
04411 static void draw_brick_actuator(uiLayout *layout, PointerRNA *ptr, bContext *C)
04412 {
04413     uiLayout *box;
04414     
04415     if (!RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "show_expanded"))
04416         return;
04417     
04418     box = uiLayoutBox(layout);
04419     
04420     switch (RNA_enum_get(ptr, "type")) {
04421         case ACT_ACTION:
04422             draw_actuator_action(box, ptr);
04423             break;
04424         case ACT_ARMATURE:
04425             draw_actuator_armature(box, ptr);
04426             break;
04427         case ACT_CAMERA:
04428             draw_actuator_camera(box, ptr);
04429             break;
04430         case ACT_CONSTRAINT:
04431             draw_actuator_constraint(box, ptr, C);
04432             break;
04433         case ACT_EDIT_OBJECT:
04434             draw_actuator_edit_object(box, ptr);
04435             break;
04436         case ACT_2DFILTER:
04437             draw_actuator_filter_2d(box, ptr);
04438             break;
04439         case ACT_GAME:
04440             draw_actuator_game(box, ptr);
04441             break;
04442         case ACT_MESSAGE:
04443             draw_actuator_message(box, ptr, C);
04444             break;
04445         case ACT_OBJECT:
04446             draw_actuator_motion(box, ptr);
04447             break;
04448         case ACT_PARENT:
04449             draw_actuator_parent(box, ptr);
04450             break;
04451         case ACT_PROPERTY:
04452             draw_actuator_property(box, ptr);
04453             break;
04454         case ACT_RANDOM:
04455             draw_actuator_random(box, ptr);
04456             break;
04457         case ACT_SCENE:
04458             draw_actuator_scene(box, ptr);
04459             break;
04460         case ACT_SHAPEACTION:
04461             draw_actuator_shape_action(box, ptr);
04462             break;
04463         case ACT_SOUND:
04464             draw_actuator_sound(box, ptr, C);
04465             break;
04466         case ACT_STATE:
04467             draw_actuator_state(box, ptr);
04468             break;
04469         case ACT_VISIBILITY:
04470             draw_actuator_visibility(box, ptr);
04471             break;
04472         case ACT_STEERING:
04473             draw_actuator_steering(box, ptr);
04474     }
04475 }
04476 
04477 static void logic_buttons_new(bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
04478 {
04479     SpaceLogic *slogic= CTX_wm_space_logic(C);
04480     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
04481     Object *act_ob= ob;
04482     ID **idar;
04483     
04484     PointerRNA logic_ptr, settings_ptr;
04485     
04486     uiLayout *layout, *row, *box;
04487     uiBlock *block;
04488     uiBut *but;
04489     char uiblockstr[32];
04490     short a, count;
04491     int xco, yco, width;
04492     
04493     if (ob==NULL) return;
04494     
04495     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_SpaceLogicEditor, slogic, &logic_ptr);
04496     idar= get_selected_and_linked_obs(C, &count, slogic->scaflag);
04497     
04498     BLI_snprintf(uiblockstr, sizeof(uiblockstr), "buttonswin %p", (void *)ar);
04499     block= uiBeginBlock(C, ar, uiblockstr, UI_EMBOSS);
04500     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_logic_buts, NULL);
04501     
04502     /* loop over all objects and set visible/linked flags for the logic bricks */
04503     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04504         bActuator *act;
04505         bSensor *sens;
04506         bController *cont;
04507         int iact;
04508         short flag;
04509 
04510         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04511         
04512         /* clean ACT_LINKED and ACT_VISIBLE of all potentially visible actuators so that we can determine which is actually linked/visible */
04513         act = ob->actuators.first;
04514         while (act) {
04515             act->flag &= ~(ACT_LINKED|ACT_VISIBLE);
04516             act = act->next;
04517         }
04518         /* same for sensors */
04519         sens= ob->sensors.first;
04520         while (sens) {
04521             sens->flag &= ~(SENS_VISIBLE);
04522             sens = sens->next;
04523         }
04524 
04525         /* mark the linked and visible actuators */
04526         cont= ob->controllers.first;
04527         while (cont) {
04528             flag = ACT_LINKED;
04529 
04530             /* this controller is visible, mark all its actuator */
04531             if ((ob->scaflag & OB_ALLSTATE) || (ob->state & cont->state_mask))
04532                 flag |= ACT_VISIBLE;
04533 
04534             for (iact=0; iact<cont->totlinks; iact++) {
04535                 act = cont->links[iact];
04536                 if (act)
04537                     act->flag |= flag;
04538             }
04539             cont = cont->next;
04540         }
04541     }
04542     
04543     /* ****************** Controllers ****************** */
04544     
04545     xco= 420; yco= 170; width= 300;
04546     layout= uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, xco, yco, width, 20, UI_GetStyle());
04547     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04548     
04549     uiDefBlockBut(block, controller_menu, NULL, "Controllers", xco-10, yco, 300, UI_UNIT_Y, "");        /* replace this with uiLayout stuff later */
04550     
04551     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_controllers_selected_objects", 0, "Sel", ICON_NONE);
04552     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_controllers_active_object", 0, "Act", ICON_NONE);
04553     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_controllers_linked_controller", 0, "Link", ICON_NONE);
04554 
04555     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04556         bController *cont;
04557         PointerRNA ptr;
04558         uiLayout *split, *subsplit, *col;
04559 
04560         
04561         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04562 
04563         /* only draw the controller common header if "use_visible" */
04564         if ( (ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_CONT) == 0) continue;
04565     
04566         /* Drawing the Controller Header common to all Selected Objects */
04567 
04568         RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_GameObjectSettings, ob, &settings_ptr);
04569 
04570         split= uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.05, 0);
04571         uiItemR(split, &settings_ptr, "show_state_panel", UI_ITEM_R_NO_BG, "", ICON_DISCLOSURE_TRI_RIGHT);
04572 
04573         row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
04574         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWCONT, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco, (short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 31, 0, 0, "Object name, click to show/hide controllers");
04575         if (ob == act_ob)
04576             uiItemMenuEnumO(row, "LOGIC_OT_controller_add", "type", "Add Controller", ICON_NONE);
04577 
04578         if (RNA_boolean_get(&settings_ptr, "show_state_panel")) {
04579 
04580             box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
04581             split= uiLayoutSplit(box, 0.2, 0);
04582 
04583             col= uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
04584             uiItemL(col, "Visible", ICON_NONE);
04585             uiItemL(col, "Initial", ICON_NONE);
04586 
04587             subsplit= uiLayoutSplit(split, 0.85, 0);
04588             col= uiLayoutColumn(subsplit, 0);
04589             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
04590             uiLayoutSetActive(row, RNA_boolean_get(&settings_ptr, "use_all_states")==0);
04591             uiTemplateLayers(row, &settings_ptr, "states_visible", &settings_ptr, "used_states", 0);
04592             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 0);
04593             uiTemplateLayers(row, &settings_ptr, "states_initial", &settings_ptr, "used_states", 0);
04594 
04595             col= uiLayoutColumn(subsplit, 0);
04596             uiItemR(col, &settings_ptr, "use_all_states", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
04597             uiItemR(col, &settings_ptr, "show_debug_state", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
04598         }
04599 
04600         /* End of Drawing the Controller Header common to all Selected Objects */
04601 
04602         if ((ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWCONT) == 0) continue;
04603         
04604 
04605         uiItemS(layout);
04606         
04607         for (cont= ob->controllers.first; cont; cont=cont->next) {
04608             RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_Controller, cont, &ptr);
04609             
04610             if (!(ob->scaflag & OB_ALLSTATE) && !(ob->state & cont->state_mask))
04611                 continue;
04612             
04613             /* use two nested splits to align inlinks/links properly */
04614             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.05, 0);
04615             
04616             /* put inlink button to the left */
04617             col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
04618             uiLayoutSetAlignment(col, UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_LEFT);
04619             uiDefIconBut(block, INLINK, 0, ICON_INLINK, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, cont, LINK_CONTROLLER, 0, 0, 0, "");
04620             
04621             //col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
04622             /* nested split for middle and right columns */
04623             subsplit = uiLayoutSplit(split, 0.95, 0);
04624             
04625             col = uiLayoutColumn(subsplit, 1);
04626             uiLayoutSetContextPointer(col, "controller", &ptr);
04627             
04628             /* should make UI template for controller header.. function will do for now */
04629 //          draw_controller_header(col, &ptr);
04630             draw_controller_header(col, &ptr, xco, width, yco); //provisory for 2.50 beta
04631 
04632             /* draw the brick contents */
04633             draw_brick_controller(col, &ptr);
04634             
04635             
04636             /* put link button to the right */
04637             col = uiLayoutColumn(subsplit, 0);
04638             uiLayoutSetAlignment(col, UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_LEFT);
04639             but = uiDefIconBut(block, LINK, 0, ICON_LINK, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
04640             uiSetButLink(but, NULL, (void ***)&(cont->links), &cont->totlinks, LINK_CONTROLLER, LINK_ACTUATOR);
04641         }
04642     }
04643     uiBlockLayoutResolve(block, NULL, &yco);    /* stores final height in yco */
04644     
04645     
04646     /* ****************** Sensors ****************** */
04647     
04648     xco= 10; yco= 170; width= 340;
04649     layout= uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, xco, yco, width, 20, UI_GetStyle());
04650     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04651     
04652     uiDefBlockBut(block, sensor_menu, NULL, "Sensors", xco-10, yco, 300, UI_UNIT_Y, "");        /* replace this with uiLayout stuff later */
04653     
04654     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_sensors_selected_objects", 0, "Sel", ICON_NONE);
04655     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_sensors_active_object", 0, "Act", ICON_NONE);
04656     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_sensors_linked_controller", 0, "Link", ICON_NONE);
04657     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_sensors_active_states", 0, "State", ICON_NONE);
04658     
04659     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04660         bSensor *sens;
04661         PointerRNA ptr;
04662         
04663         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04664 
04665         /* only draw the sensor common header if "use_visible" */
04666         if ((ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_SENS) == 0) continue;
04667 
04668         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04669         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWSENS, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco, (short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 31, 0, 0, "Object name, click to show/hide sensors");
04670         if (ob == act_ob)
04671             uiItemMenuEnumO(row, "LOGIC_OT_sensor_add", "type", "Add Sensor", ICON_NONE);
04672         
04673         if ((ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWSENS) == 0) continue;
04674         
04675         uiItemS(layout);
04676         
04677         for (sens= ob->sensors.first; sens; sens=sens->next) {
04678             RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_Sensor, sens, &ptr);
04679             
04680             if ((ob->scaflag & OB_ALLSTATE) ||
04681                 !(slogic->scaflag & BUTS_SENS_STATE) ||
04682                 (sens->totlinks == 0) ||                                            /* always display sensor without links so that is can be edited */
04683                 (sens->flag & SENS_PIN && slogic->scaflag & BUTS_SENS_STATE) || /* states can hide some sensors, pinned sensors ignore the visible state */
04684                 (is_sensor_linked(block, sens))
04685                 )
04686             {   // gotta check if the current state is visible or not
04687                 uiLayout *split, *col;
04688                 
04689                 /* make as visible, for move operator */
04690                 sens->flag |= SENS_VISIBLE;
04691 
04692                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.95, 0);
04693                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
04694                 uiLayoutSetContextPointer(col, "sensor", &ptr);
04695                 
04696                 /* should make UI template for sensor header.. function will do for now */
04697                 draw_sensor_header(col, &ptr, &logic_ptr);
04698                 
04699                 /* draw the brick contents */
04700                 draw_brick_sensor(col, &ptr, C);
04701                 
04702                 /* put link button to the right */
04703                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
04704                 /* use old-school uiButtons for links for now */
04705                 but = uiDefIconBut(block, LINK, 0, ICON_LINK, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
04706                 uiSetButLink(but, NULL, (void ***)&(sens->links), &sens->totlinks, LINK_SENSOR, LINK_CONTROLLER);
04707             }
04708         }
04709     }
04710     uiBlockLayoutResolve(block, NULL, &yco);    /* stores final height in yco */
04711     
04712     /* ****************** Actuators ****************** */
04713     
04714     xco= 800; yco= 170; width= 340;
04715     layout= uiBlockLayout(block, UI_LAYOUT_VERTICAL, UI_LAYOUT_PANEL, xco, yco, width, 20, UI_GetStyle());
04716     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04717     
04718     uiDefBlockBut(block, actuator_menu, NULL, "Actuators", xco-10, yco, 300, UI_UNIT_Y, "");        /* replace this with uiLayout stuff later */
04719     
04720     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_actuators_selected_objects", 0, "Sel", ICON_NONE);
04721     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_actuators_active_object", 0, "Act", ICON_NONE);
04722     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_actuators_linked_controller", 0, "Link", ICON_NONE);
04723     uiItemR(row, &logic_ptr, "show_actuators_active_states", 0, "State", ICON_NONE);
04724     
04725     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04726         bActuator *act;
04727         PointerRNA ptr;
04728         
04729         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04730 
04731         /* only draw the actuator common header if "use_visible" */
04732         if ( (ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_ACT) == 0) continue;
04733 
04734         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
04735         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWACT, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco, (short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 31, 0, 0, "Object name, click to show/hide actuators");
04736         if (ob == act_ob)
04737             uiItemMenuEnumO(row, "LOGIC_OT_actuator_add", "type", "Add Actuator", ICON_NONE);
04738 
04739         if ((ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWACT) == 0) continue;
04740         
04741         uiItemS(layout);
04742         
04743         for (act= ob->actuators.first; act; act=act->next) {
04744             
04745             RNA_pointer_create((ID *)ob, &RNA_Actuator, act, &ptr);
04746             
04747             if ((ob->scaflag & OB_ALLSTATE) ||
04748                 !(slogic->scaflag & BUTS_ACT_STATE) ||
04749                 !(act->flag & ACT_LINKED) ||        /* always display actuators without links so that is can be edited */
04750                 (act->flag & ACT_VISIBLE) ||        /* this actuator has visible connection, display it */
04751                 (act->flag & ACT_PIN && slogic->scaflag & BUTS_ACT_STATE)   /* states can hide some sensors, pinned sensors ignore the visible state */
04752                 )
04753             {   // gotta check if the current state is visible or not
04754                 uiLayout *split, *col;
04755                 
04756                 /* make as visible, for move operator */
04757                 act->flag |= ACT_VISIBLE;
04758 
04759                 split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.05, 0);
04760                 
04761                 /* put inlink button to the left */
04762                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
04763                 uiDefIconBut(block, INLINK, 0, ICON_INLINK, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, act, LINK_ACTUATOR, 0, 0, 0, "");
04764 
04765                 col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
04766                 uiLayoutSetContextPointer(col, "actuator", &ptr);
04767                 
04768                 /* should make UI template for actuator header.. function will do for now */
04769                 draw_actuator_header(col, &ptr, &logic_ptr);
04770                 
04771                 /* draw the brick contents */
04772                 draw_brick_actuator(col, &ptr, C);
04773                 
04774             }
04775         }
04776     }
04777     uiBlockLayoutResolve(block, NULL, &yco);    /* stores final height in yco */
04778     
04779     
04780     uiComposeLinks(block);
04781     
04782     uiEndBlock(C, block);
04783     uiDrawBlock(C, block);
04784     
04785     if (idar) MEM_freeN(idar);
04786 }
04787 
04788 void logic_buttons(bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
04789 {
04790     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
04791     SpaceLogic *slogic= CTX_wm_space_logic(C);
04792     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
04793     ID **idar;
04794     bSensor *sens;
04795     bController *cont;
04796     bActuator *act;
04797     uiBlock *block;
04798     uiBut *but;
04799     PointerRNA logic_ptr;
04800     int a, iact, stbit, offset;
04801     int xco, yco, width, ycoo;
04802     short count;
04803     char numstr[32];
04804     /* pin is a bool used for actuator and sensor drawing with states
04805      * pin so changing states dosnt hide the logic brick */
04806     char pin;
04807 
04808     if (G.rt == 0) {
04809         logic_buttons_new(C, ar);
04810         return;
04811     }
04812     
04813     if (ob==NULL) return;
04814 //  uiSetButLock(object_is_libdata(ob), ERROR_LIBDATA_MESSAGE);
04815 
04816     BLI_snprintf(numstr, sizeof(numstr), "buttonswin %p", (void *)ar);
04817     block= uiBeginBlock(C, ar, numstr, UI_EMBOSS);
04818     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_logic_buts, NULL);
04819 
04820     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_SpaceLogicEditor, slogic, &logic_ptr);
04821     
04822     idar= get_selected_and_linked_obs(C, &count, slogic->scaflag);
04823 
04824     /* clean ACT_LINKED and ACT_VISIBLE of all potentially visible actuators so that 
04825      * we can determine which is actually linked/visible */
04826     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04827         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04828         act= ob->actuators.first;
04829         while (act) {
04830             act->flag &= ~(ACT_LINKED|ACT_VISIBLE);
04831             act = act->next;
04832         }
04833         /* same for sensors */
04834         sens= ob->sensors.first;
04835         while (sens) {
04836             sens->flag &= ~(SENS_VISIBLE);
04837             sens = sens->next;
04838         }
04839     }
04840         
04841     /* start with the controller because we need to know which one is visible */
04842     /* ******************************* */
04843     xco= 400; yco= 170; width= 300;
04844 
04845     uiDefBlockBut(block, controller_menu, NULL, "Controllers", xco-10, yco+35, 100, UI_UNIT_Y, "");
04846     
04847     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04848     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_CONT_SEL,  B_REDR, "Sel", xco+110, yco+35, (width-100)/3, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show all selected Objects");
04849     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_CONT_ACT, B_REDR, "Act", xco+110+(width-100)/3, yco+35, (width-100)/3, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show active Object");
04850     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_CONT_LINK, B_REDR, "Link", xco+110+2*(width-100)/3, yco+35, (width-100)/3, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show linked Objects to Sensor/Actuator");
04851     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
04852     
04853     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04854         unsigned int controller_state_mask = 0; /* store a bitmask for states that are used */
04855         
04856         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04857 //      uiClearButLock();
04858 //      uiSetButLock(object_is_libdata(ob), ERROR_LIBDATA_MESSAGE);
04859         if ( (ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_CONT) == 0) continue;
04860 
04861         /* presume it is only objects for now */
04862         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04863 //      if (ob->controllers.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELVB);
04864         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWCONT, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco, (short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Active Object name");
04865 //      if (ob->controllers.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELV);
04866         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_ADDCONT, B_ADD_CONT, "Add",(short)(xco+width-40), yco, 50, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Add a new Controller");
04867         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
04868         yco-=20;
04869         
04870         /* mark all actuators linked to these controllers */
04871         /* note that some of these actuators could be from objects that are not in the display list.
04872          * It's ok because those actuators will not be displayed here */
04873         cont= ob->controllers.first;
04874         while (cont) {
04875             for (iact=0; iact<cont->totlinks; iact++) {
04876                 act = cont->links[iact];
04877                 if (act)
04878                     act->flag |= ACT_LINKED;
04879             }
04880             controller_state_mask |= cont->state_mask;
04881             cont = cont->next;
04882         }
04883 
04884         if (ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWCONT) {
04885 
04886             /* first show the state */
04887             uiDefBlockBut(block, object_state_mask_menu, ob, "State", (short)(xco-10), (short)(yco-10), 36, UI_UNIT_Y, "Object state menu: store and retrieve initial state");
04888 
04889             if (!ob->state)
04890                 ob->state = 1;
04891             for (offset=0; offset<15; offset+=5) {
04892                 uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04893                 for (stbit=0; stbit<5; stbit++) {
04894                     but = uiDefButBitI(block, controller_state_mask&(1<<(stbit+offset)) ? BUT_TOGDUAL:TOG, 1<<(stbit+offset), stbit+offset, "", (short)(xco+31+12*stbit+13*offset), yco, 12, 12, (int *)&(ob->state), 0, 0, 0, 0, get_state_name(ob, (short)(stbit+offset)));
04895                     uiButSetFunc(but, check_state_mask, but, &(ob->state));
04896                 }
04897                 for (stbit=0; stbit<5; stbit++) {
04898                     but = uiDefButBitI(block, controller_state_mask&(1<<(stbit+offset+15)) ? BUT_TOGDUAL:TOG, 1<<(stbit+offset+15), stbit+offset+15, "",    (short)(xco+31+12*stbit+13*offset), yco-12, 12, 12, (int *)&(ob->state), 0, 0, 0, 0, get_state_name(ob, (short)(stbit+offset+15)));
04899                     uiButSetFunc(but, check_state_mask, but, &(ob->state));
04900                 }
04901             }
04902             uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04903             uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_ALLSTATE, B_SET_STATE_BIT, "All",(short)(xco+226), yco-10, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Set all state bits");
04904             uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_INITSTBIT, B_INIT_STATE_BIT, "Ini",(short)(xco+248), yco-10, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Set the initial state");
04905             uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_DEBUGSTATE, 0, "D",(short)(xco+270), yco-10, 15, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Print state debug info");
04906             uiBlockEndAlign(block);
04907 
04908             yco-=35;
04909         
04910             /* display only the controllers that match the current state */
04911             offset = 0;
04912             for (stbit=0; stbit<32; stbit++) {
04913                 if (!(ob->state & (1<<stbit)))
04914                     continue;
04915                 /* add a separation between controllers of different states */
04916                 if (offset) {
04917                     offset = 0;
04918                     yco -= 6;
04919                 }
04920                 cont= ob->controllers.first;
04921                 while (cont) {
04922                     if (cont->state_mask & (1<<stbit)) {
04923                         /* this controller is visible, mark all its actuator */
04924                         for (iact=0; iact<cont->totlinks; iact++) {
04925                             act = cont->links[iact];
04926                             if (act)
04927                                 act->flag |= ACT_VISIBLE;
04928                         }
04929                         uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, CONT_DEL, B_DEL_CONT, ICON_X,  xco, yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &cont->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Delete Controller");
04930                         uiDefIconButBitS(block, ICONTOG, CONT_SHOW, B_REDR, ICON_RIGHTARROW, (short)(xco+width-22), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &cont->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Controller settings");
04931                         uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, CONT_PRIO, B_REDR, ICON_BOOKMARKS, (short)(xco+width-66), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &cont->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Mark controller for execution before all non-marked controllers (good for startup scripts)");
04932 
04933                         sprintf(numstr, "%d", first_bit(cont->state_mask)+1);
04934                         uiDefBlockBut(block, controller_state_mask_menu, cont, numstr, (short)(xco+width-44), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, "Set controller state index (from 1 to 30)");
04935                 
04936                         if (cont->flag & CONT_SHOW) {
04937                             cont->otype= cont->type;
04938                             uiDefButS(block, MENU, B_CHANGE_CONT, controller_pup(),(short)(xco+22), yco, 70, UI_UNIT_Y, &cont->type, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Controller type");
04939                             but = uiDefBut(block, TEX, 1, "", (short)(xco+92), yco, (short)(width-158), UI_UNIT_Y, cont->name, 0, MAX_NAME, 0, 0, "Controller name");
04940                             uiButSetFunc(but, make_unique_prop_names_cb, cont->name, (void*) 0);
04941                 
04942                             ycoo= yco;
04943                             yco= draw_controllerbuttons(cont, block, xco, yco, width);
04944                             if (yco-6 < ycoo) ycoo= (yco+ycoo-20)/2;
04945                         }
04946                         else {
04947                             cpack(0x999999);
04948                             glRecti(xco+22, yco, xco+width-22,yco+19);
04949                             but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, controller_name(cont->type), (short)(xco+22), yco, 70, UI_UNIT_Y, cont, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Controller type");
04950                             //uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_controller, cont, NULL);
04951                             but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, cont->name,(short)(xco+92), yco,(short)(width-158), UI_UNIT_Y, cont, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Controller name");
04952                             //uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_controller, cont, NULL);
04953 
04954                             uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04955                             but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_UP, (short)(xco+width-(110+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick up");
04956                             uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_controller, cont, (void *)TRUE);
04957                             but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_DOWN, (short)(xco+width-(88+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick down");
04958                             uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_controller, cont, (void *)FALSE);
04959                             uiBlockEndAlign(block);
04960 
04961                             ycoo= yco;
04962                         }
04963                 
04964                         but = uiDefIconBut(block, LINK, 0, ICON_LINK,   (short)(xco+width), ycoo, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
04965                         uiSetButLink(but, NULL, (void ***)&(cont->links), &cont->totlinks, LINK_CONTROLLER, LINK_ACTUATOR);
04966                 
04967                         uiDefIconBut(block, INLINK, 0, ICON_INLINK,(short)(xco-19), ycoo, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, cont, LINK_CONTROLLER, 0, 0, 0, "");
04968                         /* offset is >0 if at least one controller was displayed */
04969                         offset++;
04970                         yco-=20;
04971                     }
04972                     cont= cont->next;
04973                 }
04974 
04975             }
04976             yco-= 6;
04977         }
04978     }
04979 
04980     /* ******************************* */
04981     xco= 10; yco= 170; width= 300;
04982 
04983     uiDefBlockBut(block, sensor_menu, NULL, "Sensors", xco-10, yco+35, 70, UI_UNIT_Y, "");
04984     
04985     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
04986     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_SENS_SEL, B_REDR, "Sel", xco+80, yco+35, (width-70)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show all selected Objects");
04987     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_SENS_ACT, B_REDR, "Act", xco+80+(width-70)/4, yco+35, (width-70)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show active Object");
04988     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_SENS_LINK, B_REDR, "Link", xco+80+2*(width-70)/4, yco+35, (width-70)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show linked Objects to Controller");
04989     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_SENS_STATE, B_REDR, "State", xco+80+3*(width-70)/4, yco+35, (width-70)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show only sensors connected to active states");
04990     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
04991     
04992     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
04993         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
04994 //      uiClearButLock();
04995 //      uiSetButLock(object_is_libdata(ob), ERROR_LIBDATA_MESSAGE);
04996         
04997         if ( (ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_SENS) == 0) continue;
04998         
04999         /* presume it is only objects for now */
05000         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
05001 //      if (ob->sensors.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELVB);
05002         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWSENS, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco, (short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 31, 0, 0, "Object name, click to show/hide sensors");
05003 //      if (ob->sensors.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELV);
05004         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_ADDSENS, B_ADD_SENS, "Add",(short)(xco+width-40), yco, 50, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Add a new Sensor");
05005         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
05006         yco-=20;
05007         
05008         if (ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWSENS) {
05009             
05010             sens= ob->sensors.first;
05011             while (sens) {
05012                 if (!(slogic->scaflag & BUTS_SENS_STATE) ||
05013                      (sens->totlinks == 0) ||       /* always display sensor without links so that is can be edited */
05014                      (sens->flag & SENS_PIN && slogic->scaflag & BUTS_SENS_STATE) || /* states can hide some sensors, pinned sensors ignore the visible state */
05015                      (is_sensor_linked(block, sens))
05016                 ) {
05017                     /* should we draw the pin? - for now always draw when there is a state */
05018                     pin = (slogic->scaflag & BUTS_SENS_STATE && (sens->flag & SENS_SHOW || sens->flag & SENS_PIN)) ? 1 : 0;
05019                     
05020                     sens->flag |= SENS_VISIBLE;
05021                     uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, SENS_DEL, B_DEL_SENS, ICON_X,  xco, yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &sens->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Delete Sensor");
05022                     if (pin)
05023                         uiDefIconButBitS(block, ICONTOG, SENS_PIN, B_REDR, ICON_PINNED, (short)(xco+width-44), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &sens->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Display when not linked to a visible states controller");
05024                     
05025                     uiDefIconButBitS(block, ICONTOG, SENS_SHOW, B_REDR, ICON_RIGHTARROW, (short)(xco+width-22), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &sens->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Sensor settings");
05026 
05027                     ycoo= yco;
05028                     if (sens->flag & SENS_SHOW) {
05029                         uiDefButS(block, MENU, B_CHANGE_SENS, sensor_pup(), (short)(xco+22), yco, 80, UI_UNIT_Y, &sens->type, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Sensor type");
05030                         but = uiDefBut(block, TEX, 1, "", (short)(xco+102), yco, (short)(width-(pin?146:124)), UI_UNIT_Y, sens->name, 0, MAX_NAME, 0, 0, "Sensor name");
05031                         uiButSetFunc(but, make_unique_prop_names_cb, sens->name, (void*) 0);
05032 
05033                         sens->otype= sens->type;
05034                         yco= draw_sensorbuttons(ob, sens, block, xco, yco, width);
05035                         if (yco-6 < ycoo) ycoo= (yco+ycoo-20)/2;
05036                     }
05037                     else {
05038                         set_col_sensor(sens->type, 1);
05039                         glRecti(xco+22, yco, xco+width-22,yco+19);
05040                         but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, sensor_name(sens->type),    (short)(xco+22), yco, 80, UI_UNIT_Y, sens, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
05041                         //uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_sensor, sens, NULL);
05042                         but = uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, sens->name, (short)(xco+102), yco, (short)(width-(pin?146:124)), UI_UNIT_Y, sens, 0, MAX_NAME, 0, 0, "");
05043                         //uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_sensor, sens, NULL);
05044 
05045                         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
05046                         but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_UP, (short)(xco+width-(66+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick up");
05047                         uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_sensor, sens, (void *)TRUE);
05048                         but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_DOWN, (short)(xco+width-(44+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick down");
05049                         uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_sensor, sens, (void *)FALSE);
05050                         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
05051                     }
05052 
05053                     but = uiDefIconBut(block, LINK, 0, ICON_LINK,   (short)(xco+width), ycoo, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "");
05054                     uiSetButLink(but, NULL, (void ***)&(sens->links), &sens->totlinks, LINK_SENSOR, LINK_CONTROLLER);
05055 
05056                     yco-=20;
05057                 }
05058                 sens= sens->next;
05059             }
05060             yco-= 6;
05061         }
05062     }
05063     /* ******************************* */
05064     xco= 800; yco= 170; width= 300;
05065     uiDefBlockBut(block, actuator_menu, NULL, "Actuators", xco-10, yco+35, 90, UI_UNIT_Y, "");
05066 
05067     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
05068     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_ACT_SEL, B_REDR, "Sel", xco+110, yco+35, (width-100)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show all selected Objects");
05069     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_ACT_ACT, B_REDR, "Act", xco+110+(width-100)/4, yco+35, (width-100)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show active Object");
05070     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_ACT_LINK, B_REDR, "Link", xco+110+2*(width-100)/4, yco+35, (width-100)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show linked Objects to Controller");
05071     uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, BUTS_ACT_STATE, B_REDR, "State", xco+110+3*(width-100)/4, yco+35, (width-100)/4, UI_UNIT_Y, &slogic->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Show only actuators connected to active states");
05072     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
05073     for (a=0; a<count; a++) {
05074         ob= (Object *)idar[a];
05075 //      uiClearButLock();
05076 //      uiSetButLock(object_is_libdata(ob), ERROR_LIBDATA_MESSAGE);
05077         if ( (ob->scavisflag & OB_VIS_ACT) == 0) continue;
05078 
05079         /* presume it is only objects for now */
05080         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
05081 //      if (ob->actuators.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELVB);
05082         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_SHOWACT, B_REDR, ob->id.name+2,(short)(xco-10), yco,(short)(width-30), UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 31, 0, 0, "Object name, click to show/hide actuators");
05083 //      if (ob->actuators.first) uiSetCurFont(block, UI_HELV);
05084         uiDefButBitS(block, TOG, OB_ADDACT, B_ADD_ACT, "Add",(short)(xco+width-40), yco, 50, UI_UNIT_Y, &ob->scaflag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Add a new Actuator");
05085         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
05086         yco-=20;
05087         
05088         if (ob->scaflag & OB_SHOWACT) {
05089             
05090             act= ob->actuators.first;
05091             while (act) {
05092                 if (!(slogic->scaflag & BUTS_ACT_STATE) ||
05093                     !(act->flag & ACT_LINKED) ||        /* always display actuators without links so that is can be edited */
05094                      (act->flag & ACT_VISIBLE) ||       /* this actuator has visible connection, display it */
05095                      (act->flag & ACT_PIN && slogic->scaflag & BUTS_ACT_STATE)) {
05096                     
05097                     pin = (slogic->scaflag & BUTS_ACT_STATE && (act->flag & SENS_SHOW || act->flag & SENS_PIN)) ? 1 : 0;
05098                     
05099                     act->flag |= ACT_VISIBLE;   /* mark the actuator as visible to help implementing the up/down action */
05100                     uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, ACT_DEL, B_DEL_ACT, ICON_X,    xco, yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &act->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Delete Actuator");
05101                     if (pin)
05102                         uiDefIconButBitS(block, ICONTOG, ACT_PIN, B_REDR, ICON_PINNED, (short)(xco+width-44), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &act->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Display when not linked to a visible states controller");
05103                     uiDefIconButBitS(block, ICONTOG, ACT_SHOW, B_REDR, ICON_RIGHTARROW, (short)(xco+width-22), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, &act->flag, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Display the actuator");
05104                     
05105                     if (act->flag & ACT_SHOW) {
05106                         act->otype= act->type;
05107                         uiDefButS(block, MENU, B_CHANGE_ACT, actuator_pup(ob),  (short)(xco+22), yco, 90, UI_UNIT_Y, &act->type, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Actuator type");
05108                         but = uiDefBut(block, TEX, 1, "", (short)(xco+112), yco, (short)(width-(pin?156:134)), UI_UNIT_Y, act->name, 0, MAX_NAME, 0, 0, "Actuator name");
05109                         uiButSetFunc(but, make_unique_prop_names_cb, act->name, (void*) 0);
05110 
05111                         ycoo= yco;
05112                         yco= draw_actuatorbuttons(bmain, ob, act, block, xco, yco, width);
05113                         if (yco-6 < ycoo) ycoo= (yco+ycoo-20)/2;
05114                     }
05115                     else {
05116                         set_col_actuator(act->type, 1);
05117                         glRecti((short)(xco+22), yco, (short)(xco+width-22),(short)(yco+19));
05118                         /* but= */ uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, actuator_name(act->type), (short)(xco+22), yco, 90, UI_UNIT_Y, act, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Actuator type");
05119                         // uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_actuator, act, NULL);
05120                         /* but= */ uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 0, act->name, (short)(xco+112), yco, (short)(width-(pin?156:134)), UI_UNIT_Y, act, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Actuator name");
05121                         // uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_actuator, act, NULL);
05122 
05123                         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
05124                         but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_UP, (short)(xco+width-(66+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick up");
05125                         uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_actuator, act, (void *)TRUE);
05126                         but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_TRIA_DOWN, (short)(xco+width-(44+5)), yco, 22, UI_UNIT_Y, NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, "Move this logic brick down");
05127                         uiButSetFunc(but, old_sca_move_actuator, act, (void *)FALSE);
05128                         uiBlockEndAlign(block);
05129 
05130                         ycoo= yco;
05131                     }
05132 
05133                     uiDefIconBut(block, INLINK, 0, ICON_INLINK,(short)(xco-19), ycoo, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, act, LINK_ACTUATOR, 0, 0, 0, "");
05134 
05135                     yco-=20;
05136                 }
05137                 act= act->next;
05138             }
05139             yco-= 6;
05140         }
05141     }
05142 
05143     uiComposeLinks(block);
05144     
05145     uiEndBlock(C, block);
05146     uiDrawBlock(C, block);
05147 
05148     if (idar) MEM_freeN(idar);
05149 }
